A

App - Class in main
Main class of the program, demonstrates the use of the Hero and Villain classes
App() - Constructor for class main.App
 

C

clear() - Static method in class main.App
Method to clear the console

F

fight(Hero, Villain) - Static method in class main.App
Method to simulate a fight between a hero and a villain

M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.App
Main method of the program, generates a hero and villain and then displays their stats and prompts the user to start the fight

P

pause(int) - Static method in class main.App
Method to pause the program for a specified amount of time

S

stats(Hero, Villain) - Static method in class main.App
Method to display the stats of the hero and villain
